body: If a spellcaster dies, all prepared spells stored in his mind are wiped away. Potent magic (such as raise dead, resurrection, or true resurrection) can recover the lost energy when it recovers the character.
name: Death and Prepared Spell Retention
url: pfsrd://Core Rulebook/Rules/Magic/Arcane Spells/Preparing Wizard Spells/Death and Prepared Spell Retention
